response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer tailored to your needs.

For a limited time, I am offering the product at a special price of $950,000. This is a significant discount compared to the market value, providing you with an exceptional chance to secure this item at a highly favorable rate.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you decide to proceed, I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations, adding substantial value to your collection or endeavors.

Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
